column4: can anyone pastbin or rafb their /etc/x11/xorg.conf file please, mine is fubar
i installed nvidia-glx .. then ran glx-config enable.. and it said my file checksum didnt match, and i said ignore.. then x wouldnt load so i replaced with backup
so now i cant get nvidea workin.. and i want to see what a working file looks like
i hadn't messed with it.. some setup gui may have
yeah get someone to give ya an xorg.conf i guess
